```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(MVA)
library(tools)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
penguins= read.csv("penguins.csv",header=T)
```
```{r}
penguin= penguins[,-1]
```
```{r}
data=na.omit(penguin)
```
```{r}
species_variation=data %>% group_by(species)%>%
  summarise(depth=mean(bill_depth_mm),
length =mean(bill_length_mm),body_mass=mean(body_mass_g))
species_variation
```
```{r}
data_cor=cor(data[,3:6])
data_cor
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = data) +
 geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = sex, fill = island))

```
```{r}
Description_statistics= summary(data[,3:6])
Description_statistics
```
```{r}
Annual=data %>% group_by(year)%>% count(species)
Annual
```
